column3: Cases Pending Investigation from Previous Year (Col. 3)
column6: Total Cases for Investigation (Col. 6) = (Col.3+ Col.4+ Col.5)
column8: Cases Transferred to other State or Agency (Col. 8)
column9: Cases Withdrawn by the Govt during investigation (Col. 9)
column10: Final Report - Cases Ended as FR Non Cognizable (Col. 10)
column11: Final Report - Cases Ended as Final Report False (Col. 11)
column12: Final Report - Cases Ended as Mistake of Fact or of Law or Civil Dispute (Col. 12)
column13: Final Report - Cases True but Insufficient Evidence or Untraced or No Clue (Col. 13)
column14: Final Report - Cases Abated during Investigation (Col. 14)
column15: Final Report - Total (Col. 15) = (Col.10+ Col.11+ Col.12+ Col.13+ Col.14)
column16: Chargesheets submitted - Cases Chargesheeted Out of Cases from Previous Year (Col. 16)
column17: Chargesheets submitted - Cases Chargesheeted Out of Cases during the Year (Col. 17)
column19: Total Cases Disposed Off by Police (Col. 19) = (Col.7+ Col.8+ Col.15+ Col.18)
column22: Cases Pending Investigation at End of the Year (Col. 22) = (Col.6- Col.9- Col.19- Col.20)
